title: APIs for news
description: News organizations will face an AI reckoning in 2026 and a choice: They can keep blocking AI crawlers, suing AI companies, and lobbying for protectionist AI legislation — all the while making themselves invisible to the publics they serve on the next medium that matters — or they can figure out how to play along....
content: News organizations will face an AI reckoning in 2026 and a choice: They can keep blocking AI crawlers, suing AI companies, and lobbying for protectionist AI legislation — all the while making themselves invisible to the publics they serve on the next medium that matters — or they can figure out how to play along....
